channel.description: Recent content in Posts on JianboJiao

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Postdocoral Researcher in the Department of Engineering Science at the University of Oxford, and a member of the Biomedical Image Analysis (BioMedIA) group and the Visual Geometry Group (VGG), advised by Prof. Alison Noble and Prof. Andrew Zisserman. I obtained my Ph.D. in Computer Science from City University of Hong Kong, advised by Prof. Qingxiong Yang and Prof. Rynson W. H. Lau. I have been lucky to work as a visiting scholar in the Image Formation and Processing(IFP) group at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign (UIUC), advised by Prof.
